channel.title: Integrations on DefectDojo Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Integrations on DefectDojo Documentation

item.title: Authentication via OAuth2/SAML2
item.description: Auth0 In the same way as with other identity providers, it’s now possible to leverage Auth0 to authenticate users on DefectDojo.

item.title: Source code repositories
item.description: Findings can have a filepath and a line number as the location of the vulnerability. This is typically set when scanning an application with a Static Application Security Test (SAST) tool.
